thread.title: U.N. Seeks Urgent Aid as Famine Worries Mount
thread.title_full: U.N. Seeks Urgent Aid as Famine Worries Mount

title: U.N. Seeks Urgent Aid as Famine Worries Mount
text:
U.N. Seeks Urgent Aid as Famine Worries Mount $4.4 billion needed by end of March for parts of Africa, Yemen; ‘We are facing a tragedy’ By Biography Farnaz Fassihi Feb. 22, 2017 8:39 p.m. ET 
UNITED NATIONS—The U.N. appealed for emergency funding Wednesday, warning it needed $4.4 billion by the end of March to avert a famine threatening millions of people in parts of Africa and in Yemen. 
Some 20 million people are living between malnutrition and death, and 1.4 million children face death by starvation, Secretary-General António Guterres said during a news conference with the heads of U.N. agencies for emergency relief,...
